items.title: International Myeloma Foundation (IMF) Celebrates Myeloma Milestones for 2025 Myeloma Action Month
items.author: International Myeloma Foundation
items.description: Myeloma Action Month is an annual global awareness campaign that takes place every March to raise awareness and inspire action for multiple myeloma, a blood cancer affecting over 176,404 people worldwide. This year, the International Myeloma Foundation invites individuals to share their most meaningful myeloma milestones, celebrating resilience, strengthening connections, and inspiring hope.
